messages.messageBody:
Greetings to all,

I have just added an article to my web site entitled "Nihonto Performance Lessens in Cold Weather - A Test by Omura Kunitaro"
Please take a look if you have any interest.

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com
